text: The 1958 SANFL Grand Final was an Australian rules football competition. beat 94 to 92. West Adelaide missed a chance to win when a shot hit the goal post with 90 seconds left to play. That night, four West Adelaide players (including Neil Kerley) broke into Adelaide Oval and chopped down the offending goal post.video narration by Neil Kerley (starts at about 2:00), The Daily Telegraph == References == Category:SANFL Grand Finals SANFL Grand Final, 1958
title: 1958 SANFL Grand Final
